page.title: Richard Young
page.headline: UX/UI designer / front-end designer & developer
bodycopy: Hello! Welcome to my online portfolio, where you can see some examples of my design and development work.
I have been creating web-related content since 2004, including wireframing, UX, prototyping, design, development, and testing.
I am a huge fan of responsive design, accessibility, and clean, semantic markup, and have enjoyed working in a number of industries including e-commerce, finance, communications, and insurance.
Prior to my current career path, I worked as a composer and copywriter; both of which I found to be useful methodologies in regard to what I'm doing today.
Feel free to contact me or call on +44 (0)7967 639 192 if you would like to discuss working together.
